bibl.author: W. A. Field
bibl.title: W. A. Field to D. W. Middleton, 21 July 1870

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I send transcript of record in Cooley et al. vs. O'Conner. A new citation has been issued and served, and the bill of exceptions has the seal of the Court, and not of the Judge—but I take it that will do.
W. A. Field, Ass't Attorney Genl.
body.note: record case of Cooley vs. O'Conner
